title: Dry Bun Era
description: Katie and Travis discuss things that bring them joy. Katie chats about her trip out west….she’s tired (9:57). Why won’t anyone ask Chris Paul the hard hitting questions (30:04)? Mayors gonna mayor (41:11). Dan Campbell isn’t going to wipe your butt (1:07:06). How many hot dogs can you eat (1:12:20)? What sports pet peeves do you have (1:27:16)?
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and Travis chat about the NBA Finals, The Match, Pet Peeves & More
